title: Advent Convertible and Income Fund (AVK) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Advent Convertible and Income Fund ( AVK  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.117 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 30, 2019. Shareholders who purchased AVK prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 20th quarter that AVK has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $14.55, the dividend yield is 9.65%.
The previous trading day's last sale of AVK was $14.55, representing a -8.2% decrease from the 52 week high of $15.85 and a 20.55% increase over the 52 week low of $12.07.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the AVK Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
